Vic & Bob's Popadoodledandy


Popadoodledandy is Vic and Bob's take on a pop show, filmed for Channel 4 in December 1992 . 

The show included music-based sketches and interviews with musicians, all written and performed by Vic and Bob. The pilot was made but was never broadcast and the show was never commissioned as a series. 

It also included a performance by Milan, a 3-piece girl group featuring 16 year old Martine McCutcheon.
